nodes.text: One of Rakatan vaults in the abandoned Rakata machine chamber in the Tomb, an ancient Rakata prison on the planet Belsavis, was converted into a barracks for warriors of the Esh-kha species after they were released during the invasion of Belsavis.
The Esh-kha warrior barracks is a location in the Tomb on the planet Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
